TopicTitle: Communotron 16 unable to manually extend after transmitting

Articles.Content:
For aesthetics and because why not many of my sats and probes have multiple antennae. I have noticed that if one extends and transmits by using the "transmit data" science function, the antenna that transmitted is considered "clamped" and you lose the button to extend it by itself.

Is there a way around this? I read an action group will still cause it to extend, but right now I have not been using action groups.
Moved this over to Gameplay Questions for you, jros83.

Yeah that got me once too haha... Built a cool looking probe with lots of antennae and extendable dishes, was curious as to what "transmit" does (this was before I played career, didn't know too much about collecting science) and my antennae retract!

It happens with all the antennae in the game, and as far as I know the only way to fix it is with action groups (action groups are super easy to use though).

[or you could use the Remote Tech mod - makes probes/unmanned ships require a connection back to the KSC to be controllable, adds some new antennae, and they all stay open when deployed!]

It's perplexing that it's back in 1.05. LOOONG time ago, antena had no function at all, then an early update gave them function, then an update after that introduced this issue. THEN later still it was fixed. And it was fine forever until, recently it is back.
all antenna have this bug, not just the 16's
